name: A Day in the Life
description: A day in the life as a Software Developer. First, I write code. Next, I write more code.

name: Seinfeld Summary
description: Seinfeld is a timeless classic of a sitcom show. It is the ultimate mindless show to watch in the background.

name: Roll 'Em Up
description: Sometimes you just have to roll up your sleeves and get your hands dirty in order to learn something new.
